name: Soldier (itch) (Jarp games)
description:
You like action? explosions? flying bullets? 
RUN! 
DIVE!
SHOOT!
CLIMB!
World of Soldier can give you what you need!
Action arcade shooter made in pixelart.

This version include only first level of the game just to give the glimpse of what you can expect in full version coming JUNE 2022! 
Follow page for more!
Hope you like it!
